content:
I think I'll focus on creating a video for "What is SEO?" as it's a more engaging format for my target audience. I'll make sure to keep it concise, informative, and easy to understand. I might even include some animations or graphics to make the concepts more visually appealing.

For the script, I'll break it down into the sections you outlined, and make sure to use simple language and relatable examples to explain each point. I'll also try to keep it conversational and friendly, as if I'm having a conversation with my target audience.

One thing I'm curious about is how to measure the success of this video. What metrics should I track to see if it's resonating with my audience? Should I focus on views, engagement, or something else?
